name: Little Dragon
description: Little Dragon offers a more citrus-forward Kush experience, blending OG Kush, Colombian, and Thai genetics. While OG Kush anchors the physical effects with mid-level pain relief and a general heaviness in the limbs, the Central American and Southeast Asian genetics explode on the palate and offer complementary mental stimulation. Enjoy Little Dragon as a functional analgesic strain that shows off its flavorful exotic roots on the exhale.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Euphoric, Happy, Relaxed, Talkative, Fatigue, Inflammation, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Stress
